# Project coding standards for Backend Development
- Follow Clean Code principles.
- Prioritize readability and maintainability.
- Write clear and concise comments for each function and class.
- Ensure functions and classes have descriptive names and include type hints where applicable.
- Maintain proper indentation (use 4 spaces for each level of indentation).
- Use Clean Architecture principles for project structure.
- Ensure modules and services are reusable and maintainable.
- Write unit tests for all critical functionalities.
